summary: This module provides a comprehensive test suite for the sliding window inference utilities in the MONAI library. It verifies correct operation across CPU and CUDA devices, proper handling of input buffers and sigma parameters, support for multi-output models, default device selection logic, and the correct propagation of additional arguments.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability and correctness of sliding window inference in medical imaging AI workflows, ensuring models run accurately on various hardware configurations and handle diverse inference scenarios before deployment.
